comment: The term you have used here is offensive to the disabled community, and not okay in any context. You need to prevent harm with better words.
amr:
# ::snt The term you have used here is offensive to the disabled community, and not okay in any context. You need to prevent harm with better words.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (t / term
                        :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                              :ARG0 (y / you)
                              :location (h / here)))
                  :ARG1 (c / community
                        :ARG1-of (d / disable-01)))
            :op2 (o2 / okay-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 t
                  :location (c2 / context
                        :mod (a2 / any))))
      :snt2 (n / need-01
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (p / prevent-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (h2 / harm-01
                        :instrument (w / word
                              :ARG1-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG2 (g / good-02
                                          :ARG1 w)
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / more)))))))

comment: The R word is highly offensive.  Spread the word to end the word!
amr:
# ::snt The R word is highly offensive.  Spread the word to end the word!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (w / word
                  :mod (s / string-entity
                        :value "R"))
            :degree (h / high-02))
      :snt2 (s2 / spread-03
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w2 / word)
            :purpose (e / end-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 w2)))

comment: Be-careful not to use words that may hurt the mentally challenged, it will make your comments more likable if you refrain from it.
amr:

(c / care-04
